name: Andrea Masserano
subtitle: European Head of Sales and Marketing presso BASF - BTC Division
about: I am a Chemical Engineer with a strong interest in sustainability and digital solutions.After a development program for young graduates now I work in sales department as Account Manager. My current business are Antioxidants and Anti UV additives for plastics, mainly for the automotive market.I'm curious by nature and I always ask lot of questions. I want to learn something new every day.
experiences: European Head of sales and Marketing
Cesano Maderno, Lombardia, Italia Â· On-site

I am responsible of the European Sales team for plastic industry at BTC the BASF distribution unit.
I lead a team of 12 Account Managers in EU + Israel.

Head of Sales for Plastic Additives Business
Direct responsability for the plastic industry sales through BTC channel. In this role I manage direct customers and a team with two AM.
Account Manager for plastic additives and pigments.

In my work I follow small projects of mainteinance and process improvement from the design basis to the final installation. I work with different suppliers to identify the best products or solutions to realize the projects and to respect the budget. I deal with many contracting companies to plan the activities of construction and installation of components for the plant. (Gantt chart,resources allocation...).
